com.github.dm.jrt.android.invocation

Interface ContextInvocation<IN,OUT>

  • Type Parameters:
    IN - the input data type.
    OUT - the output data type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Invocation<IN,OUT>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandContextInvocation, ContextInvocationDecorator, ContextInvocationWrapper, DelegatingContextInvocation, FilterContextInvocation, FunctionContextInvocation, PassingContextInvocation, PassingFunctionContextInvocation, TemplateContextInvocation

    public interface ContextInvocation<IN,OUT>
extends Invocation<IN,OUT>
    Interface defining an invocation aware of the specific Android context.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 01/08/2015.
